Objective: Verify navigating to Affiliates Page from footer
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click Affiliates in footer under Extras label
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Affiliates page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Affiliates page

Objective: Verify navigating to Affiliates Page from My Account
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click Register for an affiliate account from My Account Page
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Affiliates page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Affiliates page

Objective: Verify Registering the Affiliate account by providing mandatory fields
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click Affiliates in footer under Extras label
2) Fill the mandatory fields
3) Click Continue (ER-01,ER-02)
Expected Result:
1) The User should be taken to My Account Page and a message 'Success: Your account has been successfully updated.' should be shown
2) The Register for an affiliate account should disappear and Edit your affiliate account should appear
Actual Result:
1) The User is taken to My Account Page and a message 'Success: Your account has been successfully updated.' is shown
2) The Register for an affiliate account disappears and Edit your affiliate account appears

Expected Result:

Actual Result:
1) The User is taken to My Account Page and a message 'Success: Your account has been successfully updated.' is shown

4) Click Continue

Actual Result: The field Cheque payee name shows "Cheque Payee Name required!"

Objective: Verify generating Affiliate link by providing all fields
Precondition:
1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
2) Register an affiliate account
Test Steps:
1) Click My Account dropdown in header and click My Account
2) Click 'Custom Affiliate Tracking Code' link (ER-01)
3) Click Tracking Link generator and select a product (ER-02)
4) Click continue (ER-03)
Expected Result:
1) The user should be taken to link generator field with your tracking code already filled with some value
2) The link should be generated in Tracking link textfield
3) The user should be taken to My Account Page
Actual Result:
1) The user is taken to link generator field with your tracking code already filled with some value
2) The link is generated in Tracking link textfield
3) The user is taken to My Account Page
